item.title: Introducing Woz
item.description:
I’ve spent the last few months building something that I think solves a real problem: the friction between the work I want to do and the work I have to do.

It’s called Woz. And it’s an AI assistant that acts as my personal CTO.

The Problem

There are two kinds of work in software development. The first kind is the thinking â€” the architecture, the decisions, the hard problems that require judgment. That’s the work that matters. That’s the work I want to spend my time on.
